HARVEY, MPA Executive Director MURIEL MORIN -MENDES Licensing Coordinator APRIL RAMIREZ Board Operations Support Specialist DEBORAH DIETER , PT Board Investigator PHYSICAL THERAPY BOARD 3291 North Buffalo Drive, Suite 100 Las Vegas, NV 891 29 ADVISORY COMMITTEE ON CONTINUING COMPETENCE MEE TING MINUTES June 9 , 2023 Item 1 Call to order / Roll call for Confirmation of Quorum. The meeting was called to order at 8:01 am. Committee Members present , Jenny Luthy, Vice Chair , Krysta Boyd, Chair member , Kat Joines, Board Liason Staff present: April Ramirez, Board Operations Support Specialist Item 2 Public Members -None Item 3 Review and Discussion on Board Meeting Actions. (For Possible Action) No meeting actions to discuss at this time Item 4 Review, discuss, amend and approve ACCC Meeting Minutes (For Possible Action). A. April 14, 2023 B. April 21, 2023 Motion: Motion to approve the April 14 , 2023 Meeting Minutes as presented: Jenny Luthy, Vice Chair Second: Dennis Guttiierez , PT member Motion Passes Unanimously Motion: Motion to approve the April 21, 2023 Meeting Minutes as presented: Jenny Luthy, Vice Chair Second: Dennis Guttiierez, PT member Motion Passes Unanimously Item 5 Review and discussion on the request for proposal from Redefine Health Education on Consideration of accepting CE Courses approved by other State Boards. (For Possible Action). 1 | Page Nevada Physical Therapy Board 3291 N. Buffalo Dr. Suite 100 Las Vegas, NV 89129 P. 702 -876-5535 F.702 -876-2097 I. Dr. Katie O'Bright presented to the Advisory committee on behalf of Redefine Health. After much discussion and with the request of the Advisory committee. This item will be tabled for a future agenda. The Committee would like to conduct a bit more research on the opportunit y that Dr. O'Bright presented as well as revisit some of the approved language when it comes to automatic course approvals for the APTA courses. No action taken at this time. Item 6 Course Appeal from OnlineCE.com. Review and Discussion and possible approval on previously denied course (For Possible Action). I. OnlineCe.com Course: Cardiopulmonary 103 -104 Pathophysiology and Clinical Assessment of the Cardiopulmonary System Complex. Motion: Motion to approve the previously denied course from OnlineCE.com : Dennis Guttierez, PT Member Second: Kat Joines, Board Liason Motion Passes Unanimously Item 7 Discussion on Content writers with Larger Vendors. (For Possible Action) I. Krysta Boyd, ACCC Chair Brought to the Advisory Committee the discussion on large vendor Content writers, the possibility of changing our application to include expertise in content area of a course. No action taken at this time Item 8 Review and Recommendation of new and previously reviewed Continuing Competency Courses (For Possible Action).
